channel.title: messageToAll-NOT Dodian

item.title: messageToAll-NOT Dodian
item.dc:creator: @cocoa cocoa
item.description:
@cocoa wrote:

Does anyone know how I could correctly use messageToAll in my NPCHandler to announce something is dead. I’ve got it in the correct spot but just am not sure how to use the variable correctly. This is what I used and it isn’t working.
Just an example: Ripped straight from my NPCHandler

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 3007) { ItemHandler.addItem(Item.randomkalphite(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); server.playerHandler.players[Play].Killedqueen = true; int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling; client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player]; server.PlayerHandler.messageToAll("The Kalphite Queen has been slain"); ppl.addSkillXP(1150, 18); }

Read full topic
